duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform all functions necessary to complete final reports from raw data in compliance with applicable guidelines and SOP's.
Write technical summaries for reports based on provided raw data.
Proofread reports for technical and grammatical accuracy.
Assist in the preparation of technical documents and review SOP's.
Follow instructions carefully and thoroughly from Study Director, Senior Technical Writer, and Quality Assurance Unit.
Maintain integrity, excellent communication skills (written and verbal), and organize work schedule to ensure timely delivery of reports.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science degree in biology, chemistry, or equivalent (Master's preferred)
